User Input: Find all products that cost more than 500.
SQL Query: SELECT ProductName, Price FROM Products WHERE Price > 500;

User Input: Get customer names and their emails.

SQL Query:
SELECT o.OrderID, od.ProductID, od.Quantity, od.FinalPrice
FROM Orders o
JOIN OrderDetails od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID
WHERE o.OrderID = 1;

User Input: List all orders placed by John Doe.
SQL Query:
SELECT o.OrderID, o.OrderDate, o.TotalAmount
FROM Orders o
JOIN Customers c ON o.CustomerID = c.CustomerID
WHERE c.CustomerName = 'John Doe';

SELECT p.ProductName, p.Price
FROM Products p
JOIN Suppliers s ON p.SupplierID = s.SupplierID
WHERE s.SupplierName = 'ABC Supplies';

User Input: Count the total orders placed by each customer.
SQL Query:
SELECT c.CustomerName, COUNT(o.OrderID) AS TotalOrders
FROM Customers c
LEFT JOIN Orders o ON c.CustomerID = o.CustomerID
GROUP BY c.CustomerName;

User Input: Find customers who placed orders worth more than 10,000 in total.
SQL Query:
SELECT c.CustomerName, SUM(o.TotalAmount) AS TotalSpent
FROM Customers c
JOIN Orders o ON c.CustomerID = o.CustomerID
GROUP BY c.CustomerName
HAVING SUM(o.TotalAmount) > 10000;

User Input: List all products in orders shipped by 'Blue Dart' with their quantities.
SQL Query:
SELECT p.ProductName, od.Quantity, o.CourierService
FROM OrderDetails od
JOIN Orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID
JOIN Products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID
WHERE o.CourierService = 'Blue Dart';

User Input: Show the most expensive product in each category.
Get the total tax collected for all orders.
SQL Query:
SELECT SUM(od.TaxAmount) AS TotalTaxCollected
FROM OrderDetails od;

User Input: Find the top 3 customers who spent the most.
SQL Query:
SELECT c.CustomerName, SUM(o.TotalAmount) AS TotalSpent
FROM Customers c
JOIN Orders o ON c.CustomerID = o.CustomerID
GROUP BY c.CustomerName
ORDER BY TotalSpent DESC
LIMIT 3;

User Input: Show the details of products that were returned.
SQL Query:
SELECT p.ProductName, od.Quantity, od.ReturnStatus
FROM OrderDetails od
JOIN Products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID
WHERE od.ReturnStatus = 'Returned';

User Input: List all customers who have not placed any orders.
SQL Query:
SELECT c.CustomerName
FROM Customers c
LEFT JOIN Orders o ON c.CustomerID = o.CustomerID
WHERE o.OrderID IS NULL;

User Input: Show the total revenue generated for each month.
